name: Shri Jagruti Bahuudeshiya Vikash Shikshan Sanstha
briefDescription: Shri Jagruti Bahuudeshiya Vikash Shikshan Sanstha (SJBVSS) was established in 16th January, 2007 by the Social Activist. The Organization registered as Shri Jagruti Bahuudeshiya Vikash Shikshan Sanstha N.G.O is a grass–root based voluntary organization registered under Societies Registration Act 1860 & Public trust act 1950, since year 2007. Started its work with the objectives to establish a society founded on the value of equality, justice, peace & progress, eliminating poverty, hunger, injustice, ignorance, illiteracy, exploitation & inhumanity.Today, the organization worked in different work fields like –SHG Promotion, Women Empowerment, Cultural, Environment, Health, Water & Sanitation and others. Presently organization is working in Gondia, Bhandara, Gadchiroli District including other parts of Maharashtra.Shri jagruti bahuudeshiya vikash shikshan sanstha organizes many programs that help enable people of all ages to be self-reliant and enjoy a healthy, dignified and sustainable quality of life.
